SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet

Class ServletConnection

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.Connection
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.LineBasedConnection
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.HTTPConnection
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.ServletConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChannelHandler, H2FrameHandler
public class ServletConnection extends HTTPConnection
A servlet connection is an HTTP connection implementation for the servlet container. Uses the ServletHandlerFactory from ServletServer to create request handlers for each incoming request.
Author:
Chris Burdess
